subject: RE: [junit] Where to place test classes?
msgSnippet: ... If your public methods work, doesn t that imply that the private/protected methods also work?
messageBody:
> Thanks for the info. I like this approach, because it
> still allows us to test protected methods. I also
> like that the test packages are identical to the
> production packages.
>
> Does anyone have experience using inner classes and
> JUnit in order to test private methods?

If your public methods work, doesn't that imply that the private/protected
methods also work?
